pr_title: Adding sample curl commands for publisher rest endpoints

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                      curl -k -H "Authorization: Bearer ae4eae22-3f65-387b-a171-d37eaa366fa8" "https://127.0.0.1:9443/api/am/publisher/v1/apis111"
          
          
            
                      curl -k -H "Authorization: Bearer ae4eae22-3f65-387b-a171-d37eaa366fa8" "https://127.0.0.1:9443/api/am/publisher/v1/apis"
timeline.author: malinthaprasan
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -208,10 +208,7 @@ paths:
       x-code-samples:
       - lang: Shell
         source: |-
-          curl -k -H "Authorization: Bearer ae4eae22-3f65-387b-a171-d37eaa366fa8" -H "Content-Type: application/json" https://127.0.0.1:9443/api/am/publisher/v1/apis"
-      - lang: JavaScript
-        source: |-
-          console.log('hellof')              
+          curl -k -H "Authorization: Bearer ae4eae22-3f65-387b-a171-d37eaa366fa8" "https://127.0.0.1:9443/api/am/publisher/v1/apis111"

timeline.bodyText: x-wso2-response is not in use anymore. Shall we remove this?
timeline.author: tgtshanika
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -926,7 +942,11 @@ paths:
         GET https://localhost:9443/api/am/publisher/v1/apis/890a4f4d-09eb-4877-a323-57f6ce2ed79b/resource-policies/0bcb7f05-599d-4e1a-adce-5cb89bfe58d5
         Authorization: Bearer ae4eae22-3f65-387b-a171-d37eaa366fa8
       x-wso2-response: "HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{
            "id": "6c735e1d-8041-4f1e-b246-d28edaa650b0",
            "httpVerb": "post",
            "resourcePath": "checkPhoneNumbers",
            "content": "<header description=\"SOAPAction\" name=\"SOAPAction\" scope=\"transport\" value=\"http://ws.cdyne.com/PhoneVerify/query/CheckPhoneNumber\"/>"
}"

timeline.bodyText: x-wso2-request, x-wso2-response, x-wso2-curl are not in use. Shall we remove them?
timeline.author: tgtshanika
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1512,15 +1541,19 @@ paths:
         - OAuth2Security:
           - apim:api_publish
           - apim:api_create
-      x-wso2-curl: "curl -k -H \"Authorization: Bearer f8828f52-175a-4cb2-b246-02b1e6054f97\" https://127.0.0.1:9443/api/am/publisher/v1/apis/0527a55e-8dcf-4ce5-bddf-c77e8418be8a/lifecycle"
+      x-wso2-curl: "curl -k -H \"Authorization: Bearer f8828f52-175a-4cb2-b246-02b1e6054f97\" https://127.0.0.1:9443/api/am/publisher/v1/apis/0527a55e-8dcf-4ce5-bddf-c77e8418be8a/lifecycle-state"
       x-wso2-request: |
-            GET https://127.0.0.1:9443/api/am/publisher/v1/apis/890a4f4d-09eb-4877-a323-57f6ce2ed79b/lifecycle
+            GET https://127.0.0.1:9443/api/am/publisher/v1/apis/890a4f4d-09eb-4877-a323-57f6ce2ed79b/lifecycle-state

timeline.author: tgtshanika
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -7635,6 +7886,115 @@ parameters:
     in: path
     required: true
     description: The alert configuration id.
+
+######################################################
+# The response schemas used by the API resources
+######################################################
+responses:
+
+  # Bad Request Response Schema

timeline.bodyText: Can't we have actual examples here? Does it break any intended behaviors of the doc?
timeline.author: tgtshanika
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -7870,6 +8236,7 @@ definitions:
         type: array
         items:
           type: string
+        example: []

replies.bodyText: this field is used when cross tenant subscription is enabled. Since we are deprecating that feature in 3.2.0 left the field as an empty array.
replies.author: msm1992

timeline.author: tgtshanika
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -7895,17 +8262,17 @@ definitions:
         type: array
         items:
           type: string
-          example: ["Pizzashack, Petstore"]
+        example: []

replies.bodyText: Gateway labels have to be predefined before attaching to an API, in case we define a non-existent Gateway label in the API payload, that label gets skipped. Hence left the field as empty to avoid confusion.
replies.author: msm1992

timeline.author: tgtshanika
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -8097,13 +8480,14 @@ definitions:
         type: array
         items:
           type: string
-          example: ["Finance"]
+        example: []
         x-otherScopes:
           - apim:api_publish
       keyManagers:
         description: |
           API Key Managers
         type: object
+        readOnly: true
